doctors.name: Dr. Lee Wai Yip Jacky
education: Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS) - The University of Hong Kong
Master of Science in Ophthalmology - The Chinese University of Hong Kong
Fellowship in Ophthalmology - Royal College of Ophthalmologists, UK

individual_reviews.content: Dr. Lee Wai Yip Jacky is a highly professional and caring doctor. I visited him at his clinic in Central, and despite the busy environment, he took the time to listen to my concerns thoroughly. His ability to explain complex medical terms in both English and Cantonese was incredibly helpful. The wait time was reasonable, considering the high demand in Hong Kong. Overall, I felt very comfortable and assured by his expertise.

The consultation with Dr. Lee was quite satisfactory. He is very knowledgeable and provided me with detailed explanations about my condition. However, the clinic was quite crowded, which led to a longer wait time than expected. Nevertheless, his friendly demeanor and fluency in both Mandarin and Cantonese made the visit worthwhile. I would recommend him to others looking for a reliable doctor in Hong Kong.

I had a great experience with Dr. Lee Wai Yip Jacky. He was attentive and showed genuine concern for my health issues. The clinic in Tsim Sha Tsui was well-organized, and the staff were efficient, which minimized waiting times. I appreciated that Dr. Lee could converse in English, which made communication much easier. I left the appointment feeling optimistic about my treatment plan.

I was disappointed with my visit to Dr. Lee Wai Yip Jacky. Although he seemed knowledgeable, the wait time was excessively long, which is a common issue in Hong Kong clinics. Additionally, there was a language barrier as some of the staff were not fluent in English, making it difficult to communicate my needs. I hope the clinic can improve on these aspects to enhance patient experience.

Dr. Lee is a competent and reassuring doctor. My appointment at his clinic in Mong Kok went smoothly, although it took some time due to the number of patients. He was very patient in addressing my concerns and could switch between Cantonese and English effortlessly. Despite the wait, the quality of care made it worth it. I would definitely visit him again for any future medical needs.

reviews.summary_review: Dr. Lee Wai Yip Jacky is generally praised for his professionalism, knowledge, and ability to communicate effectively in multiple languages, which is highly beneficial in Hong Kong's diverse environment. However, like many healthcare providers in the region, his clinic can experience long wait times, and occasional language barriers with staff can be a concern. Overall, patients appreciate his thorough approach and friendly demeanor, making him a recommended choice for those seeking medical care in Hong Kong.
